remarks: The result of a matrix transformation is a polynomial matrix. (Contributed by AV, 27-Oct-2019.)
statement:
mat2pmatbas.t $e |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) $.
mat2pmatbas.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mat2pmatbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mat2pmatbas.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
mat2pmatbas.c $e |- C = ( N Mat P ) $.
mat2pmatbas0.h $e |- H = ( Base ` C ) $.
mat2pmatbas0 $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> ( T ` M ) e. H ) $.
